title: Can we just ban all Riven players
body:
This dumbfuck is non-stop diving 1v3/1v4. There's no fucking reason I should be losing games because I happened to get this shit on my team.
All of it's kills are from missing team fights, flashing in, and killing a low health champion with it's ult.

This happens every single time there's a Riven in the game, without failure.

http://i.imgur.com/xrKJBZF.jpg
